TrustedScript.summary: The TrustedScript interface of the {{domxref("Trusted Types API", "", "", "nocode")}} represents a string with an uncompiled script body that a developer can insert into an injection sink that might execute the script. These objects are created via and therefore have no constructor.

remarks.para: The value of a TrustedScript object is set when the object is created and cannot be changed by JavaScript as there is no setter exposed.
-Prevent DOM-based cross-site scripting vulnerabilities with Trusted Types
